title: Implement adaptive planning with lazy instruction evaluation
description: Builds a dynamic instruction generation system that resolves task details just-in-time from the master plan, preventing stale instructions while maintaining centralized planning.
userStories: As a planning system, I want to generate task instructions dynamically so that they never become stale.
As an agent, I want current repo state and master plan context injected when I start a session.
As a maintainer, I want to update the master plan without rewriting existing task files.
successCriteria: Task shells can reference master plan sections without detailed instructions
Claude sessions receive: master plan + repo state + task metadata on launch
Master plan updates automatically reflect in new sessions
Old task files remain valid without manual updates
